description: Try this easy salmon recipe for a delicious weeknight dinner. The salmon is served in a creamy sauce alongside garlic mash and steamed green beans.
keywords: Creamy Salmon With Caper & Herb Sauce
name: Creamy Salmon With Caper & Herb Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 475 g Woolworths roasted garlic potato bake

recipeInstructions.text: Juice 1 lemon and cut the remaining lemon into wedges. Stir capers, chives, dill and lemon juice into sauce. Season. Return salmon to pan and spoon over a little sauce. Serve with mash, green beans and lemon wedges.
